Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: â€¢ Attention, people! Economic concerns are on the rise as the number of Victorians experiencing power cuts for unpaid bills has surged. More businesses report sharp falls in orders and are urging the Reserve Bank of Australia to give them a break from the unprecedented spate of rate hikes. On the bright side, falling unemployment in Australia is prompting a possible pause on interest rate hikes. Unfortunately, this may still cause mortgage holders to feel more pressure. The global banking turmoil has caused the Australian dollar to drop by 7%, but fear not! Economists predict our beloved currency will come back stronger.
